parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Fresh, new, unused, novel. Of uncertain affinity; new
An ordinance, injunction, command, law. From entellomai; injunction, i.e. An authoritative prescription.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
Old, ancient, not new or recent. From palai; antique, i.e. Not recent, worn out.
An ordinance, injunction, command, law. From entellomai; injunction, i.e. An authoritative prescription.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Feminine Singular
Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
From archomai; a commencement, or chief.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
An ordinance, injunction, command, law. From entellomai; injunction, i.e. An authoritative prescription.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
